des: "My brother gave me this recipe when he was involved in a gourmet cooking group. It is simple yet delicious, especially when the beef is cooked with mesquite briquettes."
ins: Blend onion, soy sauce, browning sauce, seasoned salt, and garlic in a blender until smooth.
